issues.message: The derived character_states invariants contradict the canonical must_stay_true invariants regarding item custody for CHAR_ARTIE. The canonical state correctly reflects items being lost or dropped during the scene, while the derived view retains stale 'held' and 'stowed' invariants.

evidence.excerpt: must_stay_true: 'inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> crumpled dollar bill (status=lost, container=world)' vs character_states[0].invariants: 'inventory: CHAR_ARTIE -> crumpled dollar bill (status=held, container=hand_right)'

issues.message: UI shows HP but character state has {'current': 0, 'max': 10}.
UI shows Damage but no matching stat exists in state.
